name: Escape The Unreal
description:
Escape The Unreal is a minimalistic 2D puzzle platformer where you play as a guy who is stuck in a unreal world. He has the ability to see the real world at some distance around him. So you have to make your way to the end of the level, collecting at least 20 "Reality Orbs" to Escape the unreal.

HOW TO PLAY-

W, A, S, D/Arrow Keys to move around.
Space-bar to Jump (Hold to Jump Higher).

CREDITS-

Developed By Tanmay Upadhyay (Founder, Infiniverse Studios), for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.


NOTE -

The Web Version is not optimized, so it may be unstable or the sounds can be glitched. I recommend you to use the downloadable version for the best experience
